          <title>
            <string language="en">Cracking hydrocarbons at a refinery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Knackende Kohlenwasserstoffe an einer Raffinerie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hydrocarbures fendants à une raffinerie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hidrocarbonetos rachando em uma refinaria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Idrocarburi spezzantesi ad una raffineria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραγίζοντας υδρογονάνθρακες σε εγκαταστάσεις καθαρισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hidrocarburos que se quiebran en una refinería</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates how long hydrocarbon molecules are split up into smaller molecules at a refinery.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">catalysts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cracking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distillation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrocarbons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">refinery</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht, wie lange 
Kohlenwasserstoffmoleküle oben in kleinere Moleküle an einer 
Raffinerie aufgespaltet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre combien de temps des 
molécules d'hydrocarbure sont fractionnées dans de plus petites 
molécules à une raffinerie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra quanto tempo as moléculas 
do hidrocarboneto são rachadas acima em moléculas menores em uma 
refinaria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra quanto tempo le molecole 
dell'idrocarburo sono scisse nelle più piccole molecole ad una 
raffineria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί πόσο καιρό τα μακριά 
μόρια υδρογονανθράκων είναι χωρισμένα στα μικρότερα μόρια σε 
εγκαταστάσεις καθαρισμού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra cuánto tiempo las 
moléculas del hidrocarburo se dividen en moléculas más pequeñas en
una refinería.</string>
          </description>
